name: Chute
description: Chute gives brands mastery over the world’s visual media – from discovering audience content and influencers, to the ideation, production, and amplification of compelling visual material through its visual marketing automation platform, Chute Insights and Chute Workspace. Chute works with some of the world’s biggest brands and publishers including Benefit Cosmetics, NBCUniversal, adidas, Brown-Forman, Condé Nast, NBA, United Nations, New York Times, and Ford.
